Html: I was loooking at the BuffCache.xml file for Rawr and was trying to add a custom buff like with the EnchantCache to just have click on and off options easier but the buff does not appear in the list and I do not even know if it would work if it did since I'm trying to modify by a percentage of health. Â Does anyone know how to add a custom buff and also is there "bonus health multiplier" field of some type to modify overall health by a percentage?
You can add new buffs, but you can't add new stats. I don't think we have a stat for health percentage.

BonusStaminaMultiplier would be closest to what you want.

If you'd like to add a custom buff to the buff cache, you totally can. Just be sure to switch <IsCustom>false</IsCustom> to <IsCustom>true</IsCustom>.
